      • isInputCorrect

        public static boolean isInputCorrect(java.lang.String input)
        The following method takes value of the user and validates if the command is allowed. The checks include that they follow chess protocol letter than digit
        Parameters:
        input - takes in the scanner.in and check the char values
        Returns:
        return true if the input is allowed

      • pawnUpgrade

        private static ChessPiece pawnUpgrade(char type,
                                      char player)
        The following method handles the chess function of upgrading a pawn piece when a pawn reaches the end of the opponents board they can promote to any piece.
        Parameters:
        Takes - in a char to determine what new piece to create
        Takes - in char to determine if it is player 1 or player 2
        Returns:
        Returns the proper chess piece for the player.
